Text.Language: Nirwmi ettal/out e~nie~j/ou n/e~terhwt hi yalacca a~mwini ouahy/nou n~cwi n~taery/nou n~ouo~hi n~reftaherwmi
The men aboard the ships sailing on the sea, come follow me so that I make you the fishers of men.

Je n/e~tetennaconhou hijen pikahi eue~swpi euconh qen niv/oui ouoh n/e~tetennabolou e~bol hijen pikahi eue~swpi eub/l qen niv/oui
For those which you will bind on earth shall be bound in the heavens and those which you will loosen on earth shall be loosened in Heaven.

Kurioc I/#c# P,#c#: afcwtp n~nefa~poctoloc: e~te Petroc nem And~reac: Iw#a# nem Iakwboc.
(Our) Lord Jesus Christ has chosen His Apostles: who are Peter and Andrew, John and James.

Loipon Vilippoc nem Matyeoc: Baryolomeoc nem Ywmac: Iakwboc n~te Alveoc: nem Cimwn pikananeoc.
Then Philip and Matthew, Bartholomew and Thomas, James the son of Alphaeus, and Simon the Canaanite.

Yaddeoc nem Matyiac: Pauloc nem Markoc nem Lokac nem p~cepi n~te nimay/t/c n/e~tafmosi n~ca pencwt/r.
Thaddaeus and Matthias, Paul and Mark and Luke and the rest of the Disciples who followed our Savior.

Matyiac v/e~tafswpi n~t~sebiw n~Ioudac nem p~jwk e~bol nem p~cepi n/e~taumosi n~ca decpota
Matthias, who was chosen in place of Judas; all of them and the rest followed the Master.

Apou q~rwou senaf e~bol hijen p~ho m~p~kahi t/rf ouoh noucaji auvoh sa aur/jc n~]oikoumen/.
Their voice has gone out over the face of all the earth, and their words to the ends of the world.
